name: 0CT0-GONE
description:
You are Octo, an octopus repair droid stranded amongst wreckage on the outskirts of space.

Using the array of tools available, you will maneuver through space, gather salvage, craft components, and repair your ship in order to send a signal home... and hopefully recover your corrupted memory along the way.

-------------------------------

This project was made remotely in  4 months by a core team of six students during the coronavirus pandemic. It is still in active development, so please feel free to share any feedback or bugs your encounter along the way and we will do our best to address them.
